message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's designed to enhance your daily life with its innovative features and exceptional quality. Given its unique benefits, I believe it's worth more than $120 to you. Let's start our negotiation at $150. Looking forward to your response!
I'm interested in the product, but $150 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $120, which is the maximum I'm willing to spend. Can we meet in the middle at $135?
